beforeStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.
Launch browser and open the Login Page.
Log in with valid credentials and open the Jenkins Main Page.

steps.name: Login with credentials
Fetch and update Jenkins CSRF crumb token.
Create requests session using Selenium WebDriver cookies.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='', current_username='admin'))

steps.name: Open Plugins Page
Go to Plugins Page

beforeStages.name: Prepare: Install "SSH server" plugin, open "Installed plugins" Page.

steps.name: Go to Available Plugins Page
Install "SSH server" plugin.
Open "Installed plugins" Page.
Check that "SSH server" plugin is not installed.
Type "SSH server" to search field.
Check that "SSH server" plugin already uninstalled.
Uninstall "SSH server" plugin.
Assert that "SSH server" plugin has been uninstalled.

afterStages.name: Configure WebDriver with options and save failure screenshot.::0
